meanings.definition: A facial expression made by turning up the corners of the mouth to show happiness or amusement.
meanings.sent1: She greeted me with a big smiley.
meanings.sent2: The child's smiley brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: The smiley on his face was contagious, making everyone around him smile too.
meanings.sent4: Her smiley was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember her smiley as a symbol of joy.

meanings.definition: A small digital image or icon used to convey an emotion in electronic communication.
meanings.sent1: He sent me a cute smiley in the chat.
meanings.sent2: The email had a smiley at the end to show gratitude.
meanings.sent3: The smiley in the text message made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The smiley on the screen seemed to wink at me playfully.
meanings.sent5: I always use a smiley to express my happiness in texts.
